title: On the adelic Gaussian hypergeometric function
abstract:
We define the adelic hypergeometric function of special Gaussian type by
means of a tower of hypergeometric curves. This function takes values in an
adelic completed group ring and interpolates all the hypergeometric functions
of the same type over all finite fields. It specializes at the unit argument to
the adelic beta function of Ihara and Anderson. We prove some transformation
formulas and a summation formula for the adelic hypergeometric function, which
are known classically for complex hypergeometric functions.
